name: DOOM Open Beta
notes: The game isn't currently playable due to a missing feature in Wine. Follow https://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=40418 to know when this will be fixed.
content:
game:
  appid: 350470
  arch: 64bit
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: xact_jun2010
    description: Installing Xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
winesteam:
  version: 1.9.8-x86_64
